ygData.subject: Re: Good to see...good to see
ygData.msgSnippet: Greetins, Know of one such a person and it s nothing weird. It just seems that if a woman is afraid or scared to go to a certain place or whatever it seems
ygData.messageBody:
Greetins,

Know of one such a person and it's nothing weird. It just seems that if a woman is afraid or scared to go to a certain place or whatever it seems more acceptable than if a man said he's afraid. So I think it is to allow more acceptance of one's fears in the game. *chuckles* Me, I don't like going to new places (once I know the area .. watch out) and the guys I hunt with know that and are patient with me. After they see that I'm comfortable then they keep sending me out to fetch since I have
the most HP out of them all. Go figya.


Azlana

Jason Coan wrote:

> From: "Jason Coan" <COANJ@...>
>
> Speaking of women.....There is one big question I have.....why do guys play girl characters....some say they are role playing.....do they also dress up in womens close and role play women in real life? or is "role playing" a female the first step towards role playing a real life female? I know there are a lot of legitimate female players, but I'd bet a large sum of money that most of the female characters are being driven by guys.....call me homophobic if you will, but I think its weird.
>
> >>> <suzkim@...> 5.19.99 12:47:10 PM >>>
> From: suzkim@...
>
> Hail,
>
> It was good to see another of the female gender with a passion for
> slashin an bashing!
> Currently on a mission to get my four bubbles for dual attack and dual
> weild *snickers*.
>
> *grumbles*
> gotta take care of some RL stuff so I can hunt.. hunt..hunt
>
> Azlana, Barbarian Warrior of Veeshan
